abstract: The drop-progress indicator style associated with the drop session.
overview:
## Discussion

This property determines the type of progress indicator displayed when the drop operation takes a significant amount of time. The [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDropSessionProgressIndicatorStyle/default] style indicates that a progress indicator is shown by the system. If you prefer to show your own progress indicator, set this property to [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDropSessionProgressIndicatorStyle/none].

# progressIndicatorStyle

**Instance Property**

The drop-progress indicator style associated with the drop session.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var progressIndicatorStyle: UIDropSessionProgressIndicatorStyle { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property determines the type of progress indicator displayed when the drop operation takes a significant amount of time. The [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDropSessionProgressIndicatorStyle/default] style indicates that a progress indicator is shown by the system. If you prefer to show your own progress indicator, set this property to [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDropSessionProgressIndicatorStyle/none].
title: progressIndicatorStyle
